result.title: Announcement : COPS-PROCESS III
result.content:
Hello, everyone!

The COPS' Competitive Programming Group hereby presents you its second contest in the series focused on Dynamic Programming.

The contest is scheduled for Jun/19/2018 18:30 (Moscow time).

The contest is ICPC-style. Each problem has 1 point. The penalty for a problem equals time taken (in minutes) to solve the problem from the start of the contest + 20 ×  number of rejected solutions. Total penalty equals the sum of penalties for solved problems.

A number of prizes and goodies for freshers at stake!!!

The contest has been prepared by navpun31, akathil, _shanky, enigma27, hitman623 and me(GT_18). You will have 3 hrs to solve 7 problems.

The problems are sorted by difficulty according to us, but I'll advise you to read all problems.

Hope you'll find the problems interesting. Good luck!

Follow Club of Programmers, IIT BHU Varanasi for regular update.
